GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
rpmsg: virtio: Fix possible double free in rpmsg_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit b7e88e4bb41dea89b1dadf7a985d7aff53720629, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit c486682ae1e2b149add22f44cf413b3103e3ef39. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rpmsg: virtio: Fix possible double free in rpmsg_probe()
